headline.main: NAZIS DENY ALARM OVER 'HOSTILE' U.S.; Berlin Calls Our Aid to Britain Futile and Warns of Japan's Role if We Enter War

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Jan. 1 -- German recognition of the unequivocal standpoints of the United States in this war is made clear tonight in an inspired review of the last year, which says: "With the exception of the enemy, England, the official policy of the United States of America constitutes the only other hostile factor for the Axis powers."
